name: Churchproject
body:
Hi EveryOne,

This is my first open-source project for use for all the church's administration.

Currently the Features included are:-
* User & Rights Management
* Baptism Certificates
* Marriage Certificates
tagline: This is a basic church project created with Yii framework along with few open source extensions for Church Administration
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
